name: SKINNYprice
overview:
Our international PATENT PENDING technology is a plug-in for e-commerce companies that give them an unfair competitive pricing advantage with huge savings for their customers by creating a thrilling marketplace of continuously decreasing product prices paid for by video advertising.

SKINNYprices brings an innovation both in terms of technology and social psychology, where the active and participatory engagement of many people benefit in creating higher rewards (i.e. discounts) through the Network Effects for the people who want to buy products as well as for the people who want to communicate their message to a willing audience.

MassChallenge Finalist In Foley & Lardner Accelerator Program In KLR Accounting Accelerator Program
